indications_and_usage: Relieves mild to moderate pain and reduces fever
do_not_use: Do not use with other acetaminophen-containing drugs

indications_and_usage: Relieves allergy symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose
do_not_use: Do not use if allergic to hydroxyzine or any of the ingredients

indications_and_usage: Treats acid reflux, ulcers, and heartburn
warnings: Long-term use may cause low magnesium levels
storage_and_handling: Store in a cool, dry place
do_not_use: Do not use for more than 14 days without doctor consultation

indications_and_usage: Relieves bronchospasm in people with asthma
warnings: Increased heart rate, caution in heart disease
do_not_use: Do not use more frequently than prescribed

indications_and_usage: Controls high blood sugar in people with type 2 diabetes
do_not_use: Do not use if you have severe kidney disease

indications_and_usage: Relieves itching, redness, and swelling of the skin
warnings: Avoid prolonged use on the face
dosage_and_administration: Apply a thin layer to the affected area 2-4 times daily
storage_and_handling: Store at room temperature, protect from light
do_not_use: Do not use on open wounds or infected skin

warnings: Risk of kidney stones with prolonged use
storage_and_handling: Store in a cool, dry place
do_not_use: Do not use if you have high calcium levels in the blood

indications_and_usage: Treats anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures
warnings: Risk of dependency with long-term use
do_not_use: Do not use if you have severe liver disease or breathing problems

indications_and_usage: Temporarily relieves cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation
do_not_use: Do not use if you are taking MAO inhibitors

warnings: May cause allergic reactions, QT prolongation
dosage_and_administration: 500 mg on day 1, then 250 mg once daily for 4 days
do_not_use: Do not use if allergic to macrolide antibiotics
